verses.verse: <S%H4069>Why,<s%> seeing <S%H6256>times<s%> are not <S%H6845>hidden<s%> from the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> do they that <S%H5234>know<s%> him not <S%H2372>see<s%> his <S%H3117>days?<s%>
Some <S%H5472>remove<s%> the <S%H1367>landmarks;<s%> they <S%H1497>violently<s%> <S%H1497>take<s%> away <S%H5739>flocks,<s%> and <S%H7462>feed<s%> thereof.
They <S%H5090>drive<s%> away the <S%H2543>ass<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> they <S%H2254>take<s%> the <S%H490>widow's<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> for a <S%H2254>pledge.<s%>
They <S%H5186>turn<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way:<s%> the <S%H6035>poor<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H2244>hide<s%> themselves <S%H3162>together.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> as <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>asses<s%> in the <S%H4057>desert,<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> they <S%H3318>forth<s%> to their <S%H6467>work;<s%> <S%H7836>rising<s%> <S%H7836>betimes<s%> for a <S%H2964>prey:<s%> the <S%H6160>wilderness<s%> yields <S%H3899>food<s%> for them and for their <S%H5288>children.<s%>
They <S%H7114>reap<s%> every one his <S%H1098>corn<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and they <S%H3953>gather<s%> the <S%H3754>vintage<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
They cause the <S%H6174>naked<s%> to <S%H3885>lodge<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H3830>clothing,<s%> that they have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3682>covering<s%> in the <S%H7135>cold.<s%>
They are <S%H7372>wet<s%> with the <S%H2230>showers<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H2263>embrace<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> for <S%H1097>want<s%> of a <S%H4268>shelter.<s%>
They <S%H1497>pluck<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> from the <S%H7699>breast,<s%> and <S%H2254>take<s%> a <S%H2254>pledge<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor.<s%>
They cause him to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H3830>clothing,<s%> and they <S%H5375>take<s%> away the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> from the <S%H7456>hungry;<s%>
Which make <S%H6671>oil<s%> <S%H996>within<s%> their <S%H7791>walls,<s%> and <S%H1869>tread<s%> their <S%H3342>winepresses,<s%> and suffer <S%H6770>thirst.<s%>

<S%H4962>Men<s%> <S%H5008>groan<s%> from out of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> <S%H7768>cries<s%> out: yet <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H7760>lays<s%> not <S%H8604>folly<s%> to them.

They are of those that <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against the <S%H216>light;<s%> they <S%H5234>know<s%> not the <S%H1870>ways<s%> thereof, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> in the <S%H5410>paths<s%> thereof.
The <S%H7523>murderer<s%> <S%H6965>rising<s%> with the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H6991>kills<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> and in the <S%H3915>night<s%> is as a <S%H1590>thief.<s%>

The <S%H5869>eye<s%> also of the <S%H5003>adulterer<s%> <S%H8104>waits<s%> for the <S%H5399>twilight,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H7789>see<s%> me: and <S%H5643>disguises<s%> his <S%H6440>face.<s%>

In the <S%H2822>dark<s%> they <S%H2864>dig<s%> <S%H2864>through<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> which they had <S%H2856>marked<s%> for themselves in the <S%H3119>daytime:<s%> they <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H216>light.<s%>

For the <S%H1242>morning<s%> is to them even as the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death:<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> one <S%H5234>know<s%> them, they are in the <S%H1091>terrors<s%> of the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death.<s%>

He is <S%H7031>swift<s%> as the <S%H4325>waters;<s%> their <S%H2513>portion<s%> is <S%H7043>cursed<s%> in the <S%H776>earth:<s%> he <S%H6437>beholds<s%> not the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards.<s%>
<S%H6723>Drought<s%> and <S%H2527>heat<s%> <S%H1497>consume<s%> the <S%H7950>snow<s%> <S%H4325>waters:<s%> so does the <S%H7585>grave<s%> those which have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>

The <S%H7358>womb<s%> shall <S%H7911>forget<s%> him; the <S%H7415>worm<s%> shall feed <S%H4988>sweetly<s%> on him; he shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H2142>remembered;<s%> and <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%> as a <S%H6086>tree.<s%>
He <S%H7462>evil<s%> entreats the <S%H6135>barren<s%> that <S%H3205>bears<s%> not: and does not <S%H3190>good<s%> to the <S%H490>widow.<s%>
He <S%H4900>draws<s%> also the <S%H47>mighty<s%> with his <S%H3581>power:<s%> he <S%H6965>rises<s%> up, and <S%H3808>no<s%> man is <S%H539>sure<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%>
Though it be <S%H5414>given<s%> him to be in <S%H983>safety,<s%> where on he <S%H8172>rests;<s%> yet his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are on their <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

They are <S%H7426>exalted<s%> for a <S%H4592>little<s%> while, but are <S%H369>gone<s%> and <S%H4355>brought<s%> <S%H4355>low;<s%> they are <S%H7092>taken<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> as <S%H3605>all<s%> other, and <S%H5243>cut<s%> off as the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H7641>ears<s%> of corn.
And <S%H518>if<s%> it be not so <S%H645>now,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H7760>make<s%> me a <S%H3576>liar,<s%> and <S%H7760>make<s%> my <S%H4405>speech<s%> <S%H408>nothing<s%> worth?
